betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Magic Hand Mirror is similar as the Magic Mirror and is more portable than the Magic Mirror. When using, right click on the hand mirror that has been linked to the target magic mirror can open the interface, put the item into the grid, it will be spit out by the target magic mirror. 

Magic Hand Mirror is bound by right-clicking on the magic mirror (a shimmering light similar to the possessed state will appear on the hand mirror after the binding is successful), to bind with a new magic mirror, right-click again, a piece of magic mirror can be bound to more than one magic hand mirror, when the location of the bound magic mirror changes, the magic hand mirror will need to be rebound 

Magic hand mirror can only transmit items, can not receive items.
